ACE

SSC FLIGHT SYSTEM

The Ace can fly whenever they move or Boost.

MISSILE LAUNCHER

No description given.

BARREL ROLL

Trigger: A melee or ranged attack hits the Ace.
The Ace performs a barrel roll, flying 6 spaces in any direction and causing the attack to miss. This movement ignores engagement and does not provoke reactions.

DEMOLITION BOMBING BAY

1/round, as a quick action, the Ace can fly spaces equal to its Speed in any direction, dropping a delayed-burst bunker-buster bomb on one of the free spaces along its path. At the start of the next round, the bomb explodes, dealing 8 AP explosive damage and destroying any terrain in a blast 1 area.

MISSILE SWARM

This weapon deals double damage to characters with Lock On and doesn’t affect allied characters.

GRUNT

CHAFF

The Grunt has 1 HP and can’t gain more. Unlike other characters, they never take damage when they succeed on a save – regardless of the weapon or system used – but otherwise take damage normally.

WEAK

The Grunt can never have more than 1 Structure and 1 Stress, and they are immediately destroyed when they take heat from any source other than their own systems and weapons.

RANK AND FILE

The Grunt can’t take the Veteran, Squad, Elite, or Ultra templates.
